body_html: Hi all, it's been awhile, and I haven't forgotten about this. I'm doing an analysis of DeepMind's Noisy Nets versus OpenAI's Parameter Space Noise, and wanted to revisit this when that's done. I'll be implementing the OpenAI version shortly, and wanted to investigate including that in this PR. I'll close this for now and reopen when I've thought through that a bit more.
